server.name: io.github.shinpr/mcp-local-rag
server.description: Easy-to-setup local RAG server with minimal configuration

environmentVariables.description: Base directory for document storage (defaults to current working directory)
environmentVariables.name: BASE_DIR

environmentVariables.description: Path to LanceDB database directory (defaults to ./lancedb/)
environmentVariables.name: DB_PATH

environmentVariables.description: Directory where Transformers.js models are cached (defaults to ./models/)
environmentVariables.name: CACHE_DIR

environmentVariables.description: Maximum file size in bytes (defaults to 104857600 / 100MB)
environmentVariables.name: MAX_FILE_SIZE

environmentVariables.description: Text chunk size for splitting documents (defaults to 512)
environmentVariables.name: CHUNK_SIZE
